name: Hologram Dubstep Simulator
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Hologram.
Hologram Dubstep Simulator
Hologram Dubstep simulator - a simulation game where you can play on your phone like a 3D hologram dubstep music! The game uses a camera for a more realistic effect! Try this simulator DJ!
Write your own music! Do the disco at home!
Show your friends a hologram! Let them think that you are able to do an illusion! Make your music, pleasantly surprising your friends!
Make fun and play your friends and loved ones!
Thank you for playing our games and apps! Leave us feedback and we try to make our games better!
